page.title: 18Garden Survey in Tremorfa.
page.content: Gardens.All but one of the people interviewed lived in premises with its own garden.Great variety in size and usage.22% had gardens in the front,side and rear of the house;most being medium to large size.59% had single gardens nearly all of them at the rear of the house-but great variety in size from large to small.Others had front and rear gardens of varying sizes. 50% had at least one lawn often with flower borders and rockeries.66% said that they didn't grow vegetables in their gaedens but preferred lawns,flowers,fruit etc. Some houses had concrete or paving. Most popular among the vegetable growers were tomatoes followed by potatoes,beans,lettuces,cabbages and then carrots.
